body.title: Rules in ORDER 1 - APPLICATION AND INTERPRETATION

rule.ruleBody: These Rules may be cited as the Abia State High Court (Civil Procedure) Rules 2009 and shall come into force on the 1st day of July, 2009.

body.title: Rules in ORDER 1 - APPLICATION AND INTERPRETATION
